extensionDescription.message: Securely encrypt and upload large attachments to any Send service instance (formerly Firefox Send).

composeActionTitle.message: Thunderbird Send, Add attachment to get started

manageNote.message: This is your account settings for the selected Thunderbird Send account. For the global options/preferences page, go to the Thunderbird üß© Add-ons manager or click the button above.

manageGetList.message: Click this link for a list of $link$ and their respective maximum file size.

manageDownloadLimitHelp.message: The files will expire after this number of downloads. Make sure it is less than the maximum downloads supported by this Send service instance.

manageTimeLimitHelp.message: The files will expire after this time. Make sure it is less than the maximum time supported by this Send service instance.

manageMaxSizeHelp.message: Maximum file size supported by this Send service instance.

popupDownloadLimitDesc.message: The file will expire after this number of downloads. Make sure it is less than the maximum downloads supported by this Send service instance.

popupTimeLimitDesc.message: The file will expire after this time. Make sure it is less than the maximum time supported by this Send service instance.

popupPwdWarning.message: Use different methods to send the password and file to the recipients. Including the password in the same e-mail as the link to the file does not provide any additional security.

popupPwdHelp.message: Optionally protect the file with a password.

popupPwdGenOpt1Title.message: Password with upper/lowercase letters, numbers and symbols

popupPwdGenOpt2Title.message: Password with only upper/lowercase letters and numbers

popupPwdGenOpt3Title.message: Passphrase with long words up to 9 characters

popupPwdGenOpt4Title.message: Passphrase with short words up to 5 characters

popupPwdGenOpt5Title.message: Emoji password with basic emoji and the family, role, gendered, hair and other sequences

popupPwdGenOpt6Title.message: Emoji password with only the basic emoji

optionsNote.message: This is your global options/preferences for Thunderbird Send. For the account management pages, go to the Thunderbird ‚öôÔ∏è Options/Preferences.

optionsPopupDesc.message: Use compose action popups in the compose window instead of standalone popup windows. Experimental and requires Thunderbird 115 or greater to automatically open the compose action popups.

optionsLinkLabel.message: Create link for Send service instance

optionsLinkDesc.message: Adds a ‚ÄúLearn more about‚Äù link for the Send service instance to footer of messages.

notifInstallMessage.message:
Thank you for installing the ‚Äú$name$‚Äù add-on!
Version: $version$

notifUpdateMessage.message:
The ‚Äú$name$‚Äù add-on has been updated to version $version$. Click to see the release notes.

‚ù§Ô∏è Huge thanks to the generous donors that have allowed me to continue to work on this extension!

notifUnsupportedVersionMessage.message: Error: The ‚Äú$service$‚Äù Send service instance has an unsupported server version: $version$. This extension requires at least version 3.

notifUnableVersionTitle.message: ‚ùå Unable to determine Send server version

notifUnableVersionMessage.message: Error: Unable to determine the ‚Äú$service$‚Äù Send service instance server version. Please check your internet connection and settings.

notifOpenPopupTitle.message: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Open compose action popup to continue

notifOpenPopupMessage.message: The add-on was unable to open the popup directly, so please click the ‚ÄúThunderbird Send‚Äù button in the compose window toolbar to continue.

notifUploadCancelMessage.message: Upload of the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file was aborted.

notifUploadUnableMessage.message: Error: Unable to upload the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file: $error$. The download or time limit is likely above the maximum supported by this Send service instance.

notifUnablePasswordMessage.message: Error: Unable to add password to the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file.

notifUploadDoneMessage.message: The ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file was successfully encrypted and uploaded in $time$! Expires after:

notifUploadErrorMessage.message: Error: Unable to upload the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file: $error$. Please check your internet connection.

notifCancelAlreadyMessage.message: Error: Upload of the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù file was already canceled.

notifNotFoundCancelMessage.message: Error: Unable to find file to cancel upload. It may have already been deleted.

notifNotFoundDeleteMessage.message: Error: Unable to find uploaded file to delete. It may have already been deleted.

notifDeleteSuccessMessage.message: The ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù uploaded file was successfully deleted.

notifDeleteUnableMessage.message: Error: Unable to delete the ‚Äú$filename$‚Äù uploaded file: $text$. It may have expired or already been deleted.
